about_the_game:
NOTE: This game is best experienced with a racing wheel. The handbrake must be used for drifting. (Space)

The Update contains the following:

Featuring Drift Events! (Circuit Events, Quick Events, Point Targeted Events and more)
10 NEW Tracks + Open World.
5 Extra Free Cars Available In The Update.
New Wheels.
Updated Textures
Lighting Improvements
Vehicle Physics Improved.
Car Modification Updated.


Description

* 100% Development support.

* Full Controller Support except for the Launcher

Vehicles feature many body upgrades and tuning options for players to build custom rides.

fully tune-able physics to allow players to choose their unique drift builds.

An entire city including off-road trails and drift tracks.



Vehicle features:

  • Incredible vehicle graphics.

  • Fully customisation body mods.

  • Build settings for vehicles allowing changes to Engines, Air filter, Battery, Gearbox, Fuel tank and more.

  • Stunning colours for vehicle body and wheels and tyre smoke.

  • Full physics control allowing drift adaptation.

  • Hydraulics for all vehicles.

  • Suspension and wheel position tuning.

Graphical Features

  • Completely dynamic city.

  • Stunning graphics designed to attract all dynamic lighting towards vehicles.

  • Camera Angles to fit different players preferences.

  • Reflective roads/paths and other areas throughout the map providing a realistic but colourful design, unique for the set purpose.

  • Vehicle physics react to various areas throughout the map such as speed bumps, grass, track racing etc..

  • Colourful map designed to bring uniqueness to a drift game.

Game-play Features

  • Full Controller/Wheel Support and remapping.

  • Unique drift physics bringing an entirely new experience.

  • Smoking streets providing players with the real drift effect.

  • Fast and Easy UI designs.

  • Options provided to reduce game quality settings to fit various systems.

All images provided are actual in-game footage*

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7,8,8.1,10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 2GB / AMD HD7870 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10/8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 (or above)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY
